playerFlags.open: The Clan doesn't require any invites
playerFlags.friendlyfire: The Clan doesn't prevent the members from killing each other

adminFlags.nopowerloss: You don't lose power when you die in this zone
adminFlags.silent: The Clan isn't mentioned when you cross its border
adminFlags.strongborders: The Clan's land cannot be claimed
adminFlags.unlimitedland: The Clan has no limit to the amount of land it can have
adminFlags.uncharted: The Clan does not show up on a map
adminFlags.default: The Clan is one of the default Clan
adminFlags.nodamage: You cannot take damage on this Clan's land
adminFlags.nobuild: Players can't break or place blocks in this region
adminFlags.bonuspower: You lose/gain more power when you die/kill on this Clan's land
